title: Celestial Brush of the Dragon's Dawn
prompt: (masterpiece), (best quality), highly detailed digital painting, Fantasy Xianxia style, a graceful immortal painter in flowing traditional robes standing on a bamboo scaffold, painting a massive, majestic golden Chinese dragon and a celestial winged deity mural on an ancient brick wall. The street is narrow and paved with dark cobblestones, lined with glowing red lanterns. Dramatic dawn sky with purple, pink, and orange gradients. A watchful six-tailed fox (Kitsune) companion sits beside the glowing palette on the ground. Magic emanating from the paintbrush, illuminating the scene. Traditional Chinese architecture background, high contrast lighting, volumetric light, (9:16 aspect ratio).
